trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that contains the type of claim.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置元素，包含声明的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ClaimTypeElement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ClaimTypeElement"></xref> class.
A uniform resource identifier (URI) that specifies the type of claim.
trans-unit.target: 指定声明类型的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: Predefined claim types are available as static properties of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 预定义的声明类型都可用作静态属性的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A boolean value that specifies whether the claim is optional.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定声明是否可选。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string representation of a uniform resource identifier (URI) that specifies the type of claim.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的字符串表示形式指定的声明类型的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: Predefined claim types are available as static properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> class.
trans-unit.target: 预定义的声明类型都可用作静态属性的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes>类。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes>

trans-unit.source: A uniform resource identifier (URI) that specifies the type of claim.
trans-unit.target: 指定声明类型的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether the claim is optional.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定声明是否可选。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the claim is optional; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果声明是可选的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
